de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.sparqlquery

Class OntQueryTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.sparqlquery.OntQueryTool

  • public class OntQueryTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides static functions for applying damage-related SPARQL-Queries to an existing ontology

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies a SPARQL query to an existing ontology

      Modifies a SPARQL query to fit a certain damageClass, modifies filtering parameters and applies it to an existing ontology

      Modifies a SPARQL query to fit a certain damageClass and apply it to an existing ontology

    • Method Detail

      • applyQuery

        public static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet applyQuery(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontology,
                                                         java.lang.String queryPath)
        Applies a SPARQL query to an existing ontology
        Parameters:
        ontology - The given ontology as OntModel
        queryPath - The file location of the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the ResultSet of the processed SPARQL query

      • applyQueryWithModifiedDamageType

        public static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet applyQueryWithModifiedDamageType(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontology,
                                                                               java.lang.String queryPath,
                                                                               java.lang.String damageClass)
        Modifies a SPARQL query to fit a certain damageClass and apply it to an existing ontology
        Parameters:
        ontology - The given ontology as OntModel
        queryPath - The file location of the SPARQL query, which will be modified
        damageClass - The damage class that exchanges the general dot:Damage class in the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the ResultSet of the modified and processed SPARQL query

      • applyQueryWithModifiedDamageParameters

        public static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet applyQueryWithModifiedDamageParameters(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontology,
                                                                                     java.lang.String queryPath,
                                                                                     java.lang.String damageAreaID,
                                                                                     java.lang.String damageClass)
        Modifies a SPARQL query to fit a certain damageClass, modifies filtering parameters and applies it to an existing ontology
        Parameters:
        ontology - The given ontology as OntModel
        queryPath - The file location of the SPARQL query, which will be modified
        damageAreaID - (optional) The ID of the damage area. If this parameter is null, the query is applied on all damage areas.
        damageClass - The damage class that exchanges the general dot:Damage class in the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the ResultSet of the modified and processed SPARQL query

      • applyRenovationClassQuery

        public static org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet applyRenovationClassQuery(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontology,
                                                                        java.lang.String queryPath,
                                                                        java.lang.String renovationName)
        Modifies SPARQL query for renovation class filtering to fit a certain renovation type and apply it to an existing ontology
        Parameters:
        ontology - The given ontology as OntModel
        queryPath - The file location of the SPARQL query, which will be modified
        renovationName - The renovation name that exchanges the general srmo:renovationName class in the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the ResultSet of the modified and processed SPARQL query
